description: Modular Telegram bot for managing your groups with a few extras!

env.description: Set this to True if you want ! to be a command prefix along with /

BAN_STICKER.description: ID of the sticker you want to use when banning people.

description: Set this to True if you want to delete command messages from users who don't have the perms to run that command.
Optional: link where you would like to receive donations.
Setting this to ANYTHING will enable environment variables.
Your user ID as an integer.
Port to use for your webhooks.
Enforce gbans across new groups as well as old groups. When a gbanned user talks, they will be banned.

SUDO_USERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as sudo users.

SUPPORT_USERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you wanna assign as support users(gban perms only).

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks.

WHITELIST_USERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as whitelisted - can't be banned with your bot.

name: Phoenix
